title: Yoga: Poses and Moves at Home
description:
Yoga Wave is the most effective way to feel sexier and healthier than ever before. Short workouts designed by yoga experts will make your body strong and flexible: achieve your goals with 100% personalized workouts that adapt to your level. Dive deeper into yoga practice with our classes and develop a keen awareness of yourself. Take care of your body and mind and keep them strong: yoga is more than a method of teaching, it's a way of life characterized by a culture of health and well-being!
 
*PROBABLY THE BEST YOGA APP*
- The most modern yoga system in the world in a pocket-size format
- Yoga Wave adapts to your yoga level: there are plans for both beginner and advanced yogis
- Practice yoga wherever and whenever you want: a yoga mat is all you need
 
*ACHIEVEMENTS*
Practicing yoga, even just 15 minutes a day, provides you with many benefits. Here's why it's worth it:
- Build muscle strength
- Improve your flexibility
- Relax your mind
- Protect your posture
- Get in shape
- Release tension
 
*THIS IS HOW IT WORKS*
- Create an account and set your personal goals: you can choose your level and the duration of your classes
- Watch tons of video workouts performed by our expert
- Follow the instructions step by step: you'll have guided classes with voice-over
- Give feedback after every workout so we can personalize the program for you 
- Yoga transforms your body and mind so that you feel more energized than ever before
 
*NEVER BORING*
- Fresh new classes are waiting for you
- Push your limits and see how the classes will strengthen and stretch your body day by day

*PREMIUM FEATURES*
By subscribing, you get unlimited access to all our professional yoga courses (Back Pain, Better Posture, Core Yoga, Postnatal, Relaxation and Stress Relief, Strength, and Weight Loss), thousands of classes, and more than 200 poses (from beginner poses to the most advanced ones).
 
Yoga Wave is the only yoga app providing Yoga Classes, Asanas, Scheduled Plans.

--------------
SUBSCRIPTION INFO:

Subscribe to take advantage of all the features described above.
• Subscription length: weekly
• Your payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase.
• You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase.
• Your subscription will renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• The cost of renewal will be charged to your account in the 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
• When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when purchasing a subscription.

Terms of service: https://bendingspoons.com/tos.html?app=1148951074
Privacy policy: https://bendingspoons.com/privacy.html?app=1148951074

We are constantly improving our apps and would love to hear your suggestions, help us develop the best app available in the store! If you have found a bug, got a suggestion, or want a new feature, email us at: yogawave@bendingspoons.com

Disclaimer: You will be required to sign up for an auto-renewable In-App Purchase before you are able to access the app.
